meanings.definition: Showing a selfless concern for the well-being of others; altruistic.
meanings.sent1: She always puts others first, displaying an ultraistic attitude towards helping those in need.
meanings.sent2: Her ultraistic actions towards the community have inspired many to also lend a helping hand.
meanings.sent3: The ultraistic superhero saved the day by rescuing all the kittens stuck in trees.
meanings.sent4: His ultraistic nature shone brightly like a guiding light in the darkness of selfishness.
meanings.sent5: The ultraistic volunteer worked tirelessly to make the world a better place for everyone.

meanings.definition: Motivated by a desire to help others without expecting anything in return; selfless.
meanings.sent1: Their ultraistic behavior towards the homeless showed true compassion and kindness.
meanings.sent2: The ultraistic group dedicated their time to improving the lives of those less fortunate.
meanings.sent3: It was ultraistic of him to give up his seat on the bus for an elderly lady.
meanings.sent4: Her ultraistic spirit was like a gentle breeze, bringing comfort to those around her.
meanings.sent5: The ultraistic act of donating all her savings to charity touched many hearts.
